snippet: José Treviño Morales, a brother of two top leaders of one of the most powerful drug cartels in Mexico, was convicted of buying racehorses to hide illegal drug profits.
abstract: Jose Trevino Morales, brother of two top leaders of one of Mexico's most powerful drug cartels, is convicted in Austin, Tex, of buying racehorses to hide illegal drug profits.
lead_paragraph: José Treviño Morales, a brother of two top leaders of one of the most powerful drug cartels in Mexico, was convicted of buying racehorses to hide illegal drug profits.

headline.main: Texas: Brother of Cartel Leaders Found Guilty on Laundering Charge
headline.print_headline: Texas: Brother of Cartel Leaders Found Guilty On Laundering Charge
